text: Landouzy may refer to: ==People== *Louis Théophile Joseph Landouzy, French neurologist ==Places== ;France *Landouzy-la-Cour, commune in the Aisne department *Landouzy-la-Ville, commune in the Aisne department ==See also== *Facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy, originally called Landouzy-Dejerine
title: Landouzy
